bucketZombie - Variable in class test.BucketZombieTest
The BucketZombie Piece Object that is analysed
BucketZombie - Class in model
The BucketZombie class provides the PlantsVSZombie game with a single Piece type that once called can create a BucketZombie Piece in of itself.
BucketZombie() - Constructor for class model.BucketZombie
Creates a BucketZombie with 25 health with 10 attack damage.
